introduction: With meticulous attention, the director surveys the territory of Limousin Mountain to meet healers, dowsers and magnetisers. Their practises question and lead us to the edge of the visible and invisible realms, to a strange zone in connection with nature and our ancestors. To the rhythm of organic music and short texts in langue d’oc, this film depicts an animist portrait of a territory and takes us on an inner search that concerns us all.
